text: Standard treatment of adult ALL during the post-remission phase includes the following:          -  Chemotherapy.    -  Tyrosine kinase inhibitor therapy.    -  Chemotherapy with stem cell transplant.    -  CNS prophylaxis  therapy including chemotherapy (intrathecal and/or systemic) with or without radiation therapy to the brain.        Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with adult acute lymphoblastic leukemia
